about_the_game:
Help Lionel on his epic hack & Slash adventure to save his home town fair from the evil Ringmaster. Explore the small town carnival, check out the rides, Carnie games, food court, a not so fun house, and make your way to the Big Top in a hand-drawn 2D art style.

What started as a normal trip to the fair with your Father has turned into a nightmare, when the Evil Ringmaster and his Big Top came out of nowhere, took over the fair and trapped the town. Thankfully your innocence helped you escape, but now you are the only one who can save the town!

  • Explore 6 hand-drawn levels all encapsulating the fun of a carnival

  • Fight enemies big and small as you hack your way to the Big Top

  • Feel in the moment as you’re brought to the carnival by the soundtrack

  • You might just learn to fly
